docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column praises New York Yankees manager Joe Girardi for charging the field after Boston Red Sox pitcher Ryan Dempster drilled Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez with a fastball; says Girardi's job is to support his players, even a beleaguered star.

headline.main: Girardi Stands, and Jumps Up, for What’s Right

docs.abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez's lawyer Joseph Tacopina declines Major League Baseball's offer to waive confidentially clause so both sides can publicly discuss case, calling it a trap.

docs.snippet: With a motive that's both chilling and simple — to break up the boredom of an Oklahoma summer — three teenagers randomly targeted an Australian collegiate baseball player who was attending school in the U.S. and killed him for fun, pro...
docs.lead_paragraph: With a motive that's both chilling and simple — to break up the boredom of an Oklahoma summer — three teenagers randomly targeted an Australian collegiate baseball player who was attending school in the U.S. and killed him for fun, prosecutors said Tuesday as they charged two of the boys with murder.

headline.main: 3 Teens Charged in Death of Australian Player
headline.print_headline: 3 Teens Charged in Death of Australian Player
